channel.title: Changin the amount of xp for mining
channel.description: i cant seem to figure out how to change the amount of exp you get from mining rune ess, iron ore...etc. i searched my client for everything ot do with rune ess, and found nothing with xp, i searched everything to do with mining and i couldnt find anything to change xp. Any ideas?

i searched for that in my client class and i didnt get any results.
